text: geudaedeul(museullimdeul)eun malhala : ‘ulineun hananimgwa, uliege naelyeojin geosgwa, abeulahamgwa iseuma-elgwa isaggwa yagobgwa (isag-ui) sonjadeul-ege naelyeojin geosgwa, mosewa yesuga bad-eun geosgwa, seonjijadeul-i geudeul-ui junim-eulobuteo bad-eun geos-eul midnola. ulineun geudeul jung eotteon nugudo gubunhaji anihamyeo ulineun geubunkke bogjonghaneun jadeul(museullimdeul)ila.’
